name: trustcareconnect
description: AI-driven healthcare communication platform with human oversight

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai-proxy" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd packages/backend && dfx start --background && dfx deploy
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:ai-proxy && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:ai-proxy && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:ai-proxy && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.setup:packages: npm run setup:ai-proxy && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && npm run deploy:local:backend && npm run deploy:local:ai-proxy
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:prod:backend && npm run deploy:prod:ai-proxy && npm run deploy:prod:frontend
scripts.deploy:prod:ai-proxy: echo 'Production AI proxy deployment not configured'
scripts.legacy:build:frontend: cd src/frontend && npm run build && cd ../.. && cp -r src/frontend/build/* dist/frontend/
scripts.legacy:clean: dfx canister --network local delete --all && rm -rf dist/
scripts.legacy:dev: npm run legacy:start && npm run legacy:deploy:local

author: TrustCareConnect Team
